name: Adventure Time - FanGame
description:
What time is it? AAAADVENTURE TIME!!!


This is a fan game made by a fan for other fans without intention of profit. The Adventure Time characters, name and logo are all trademarks of Cartoon Network.

This is a DEMO game, some art are just a placeholder and you can find some bugs.

If your item doens't appear in the inventory when you change the level, try to press E to change, and you will find your item.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move the player

SPACEBAR - Dodge Roll

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Attack

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - Use item

E - Switch Item

F - Special

R - Reset the level in case of glitches and bugs

In the game you can find 7 different swords, any of these have different strength and cool down, try using them all and find out which one you prefer.

Want to help? Could you answer some questions about the game? It only takes a few seconds: https://forms.gle/Sovs5NJoyBZSquuK6
